article_title: One Stock to Buy to Profit From the Obamacare Technology 'Gold Rush'
article_text:
Allscripts Healthcare (MDRX) Stock Slumps on Mixed Q1 Results

Allscripts Healthcare (MDRX) stock is declining on Friday afternoon, after the company posted its 2016 first quarter results after yesterday’s market close.

article_metadata.description: This tech company is in the best position to profit from the aggressive push toward the digitization of medical records, as mandated under Obamacare.
article_metadata.author: John Persinos
